title: Quarter Aged
description: Quarter-life crises are nothing to laugh about - which is what makes them so funny. Following the hilarious and addictive misadventures of Gord and his friends, Quarter Aged examines the joys and chasms of quarter-life crises through rambling introspection, laser tag, and toxic relationships while asking ourselves the dreaded question, "now what?"
author: Ian Strangway
